name: Word Whizz – find & swipe words, brain training!
name_original: Word Whizz – find & swipe words, brain training!
description:
--- One theme... find the related hidden words! ---
*** Swipe your finger across the “letters” to spell out hidden words! ***

Are you a word search expert? Then you’ll love the concept of Word Whizz!
How does it work? We give you a topic, and your task is to find the hidden words associated with that theme! With a brand new topic for each level, you’ll enjoy a fun challenge as you identify the hidden words and then swipe up, down, diagonally, and across to build them. Progress to harder levels with bigger and bigger puzzles!

Are you part of the select group of word game and puzzle lovers capable of solving all levels? Play Word Whizz now and put your skills to the test!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
7 Reasons to try Word Whizz right now:

• You can play for free!
• Word Whizz offers more than 300 levels, from easy to difficult!
• Levels range from easy to hard, but you’ll enjoy all of them!
• A fun way to hone your vocabulary, spelling, and puzzle skills!
• It’s the perfect blend of brainteaser, word game, and puzzle!
• Use hints if you get stuck!
• Easy to use, a challenge to beat!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Word Whizz is a fun and addictive word game that both casual players and serious word nerds will love! Start word-playing now and see how many levels you can beat!
Try it now for free!

IMPORTANT: some users claim there is a bug in the game. It’s not! If you can’t connect the letters it’s because you have solved the words in the wrong order! The solution? Restart the level by tapping the reset-button in the lower left corner, and try to solve the words in a new order! Good luck!
